content.raw:
For all of these, I don’t see why they wouldn’t be public functions. Or put another way, I see no reason to make them private \(and don’t want to try to anticipate how folks will use the interface\).

I think that controlling the beacon interval is important for users to understand as it will directly affect communication that goes against each channel limits. I could also imagine a situation where a single robot has many nodes that create CommsClients for different purposes. It would not make sense for each of these to send beacons.
